text: Shivani Raghuvanshi () is an Indian actress, known for playing Jaspreet Kaur in Prime Video series Made in Heaven. Her debut as a lead actor in movie Titli, produced by Yash Raj Films, earned her industry and critical acclaim. She graduated from Khalsa College, North Campus in Delhi, and was part of the Ankur Theatre Society. She was enthused by Films after watching Hum Aapke Hain Kaun on the big screen and worked towards becoming a professional actor, and landed her first break with a Vodafone TV commercial. ==Filmography== *Shockers (TV Series) *Jaan The Jigar (Short Movie) *Jutti, The Shoe (Short Movie) (2018) *Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain *Titli *Dancing Dad *Posham Pa *Devi (Short movie) * Made in Heaven (2019) * Baatein (short film) * Comedy Circus (2018) * Raat Akeli Hai (2020) == Awards == * Most Promising Newcomer Female (22nd Screen Awards) == References == ==External links== * * Category:Hindi- language actresses Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Actresses in Hindi television Category:Screen Awards winners Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Shivani Raghuvanshi
